nodes.description: 2001年6月7日，美国地方法官Richard Matsch驳回了Timothy McVeigh的延期执行申请，认定新发布的FBI文件不影响其定罪，执行定于下周进行
nodes.support_text: On June 7, Court TV reported that the judge appointed to the Oklahoma City bombing case, U.S. District Judge Richard Matsch, refused to delay the execution of Timothy McVeigh on the grounds that documents newly released by the FBI do not change the fact that he is guilty.

nodes.description: 2001年6月8日，第十巡回上诉法院驳回McVeigh的上诉，其承认新证据不足以推翻原判，决定放弃继续申诉
nodes.support_text: On June 8, Court TV reported that any hopes... that the newly produced materials do not satisfy the standard.

nodes.description: 2001年6月9日，第三巡回上诉法院暂停执行录像许可，要求重新评估联邦禁令与执行录像的冲突
nodes.support_text: According to the defense, one such document alluded to a potential witness that was previously unknown to them.

nodes.description: 2001年6月10日，McVeigh正式放弃所有上诉，接受死刑执行，进入最后24小时准备阶段
nodes.support_text: McVeigh... decided to end the process and was...

nodes.description: 2001年6月11日，执行前McVeigh在狱中保持镇定，坚持认为自己是政府战争的胜利者，完成最后通讯与心理准备
nodes.support_text: McVeigh... said he believed that McVeigh was at war against the United States government...

nodes.description: 2001年6月12日，McVeigh于美国中部时间8:14执行lethal injection，创联邦38年来首个联邦死刑案例
nodes.support_text: McVeigh... was executed at 8:14 CDT.
